resources.string: Produced by Domaine du Père Guillot of European origin, with closure type, volume of 750ml, made with various grapes and alcohol content of 12%.
Produced by Bodega López and Morena of Spanish origin with stopper type closure, volume of 750ml, made from Pinot Noir grapes and alcohol content of 12%.
Produced by Aura Wines of Chilean origin, with a cork stopper type, volume of 750ml, made with Pinot Noir grapes and alcohol content of 13%.
Produced by Viniverde - Adega Ponte da Barca of Portuguese origin with stopper type, volume of 750ml, made with various grapes and alcohol content of 9.5%.
Produced by Castellani of Italian origin with a cork stopper type, volume of 750ml, made with Sangiovese, Canaiolo and Cabernet Sauvignon grapes and has an alcohol content of 12.5%.
Produced by Terre Cevico of Italian origin with stopper type, volume of 750ml, made with various grapes and has an alcohol content of 10.5%.
Produced by Manzanos of Spanish origin with a cork stopper type, volume of 750ml, made with Tempranillo, Garnacha and Graciano grapes and has an alcohol content of 13.5%.
Produzido por Aleavini de origem espanhola com tipo de fechamento rolha, volume de 750ml, feito com várias uvas e possui um teor de alcoólico de 12%.
Developer with experience in android development, with knowledge in database, versioning and who values good programming practices.
